Rustam does not have such savings, but he would very much like for his son to study at the university and receive higher education. Therefore Rustam applied for a loan. He promises to pay the loan back on time through his business. He hopes for your support.

loans.use: to pay for his son's university tuition

loans.name: Saul Osmin

texts.es:
Saul de 27 años de edad,  estudió hasta 9º grado por los escasos recursos económicos, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a trabajar en la venta de tortillas, tienen 2 hijos de los cuales uno está estudiando, por lo que son 3 personas las que dependen de él.
	

Actualmente, Saul se dedica a trabajar en un taller de carpintería y lo ha hecho desde niño, lo aprendió por curiosidad y después le gustó, además trabaja en la agricultura, él se traslada 1 kilómetro en bicicleta para poder llegar hasta su trabajo, su horario es de 7:00 am a 5:00 pm y aveces cuando tiene mucho trabajo sale mas tarde.


El crédito lo necesita para comprar una motocicleta, ya que él viaja seguido a otros municipios y en bus se tarda demasiado para llegar.



Sus sueños son ver crecer a sus hijos, darles todo lo necesario para que ellos sean unas personas de bien, tener una mejor vivienda para su familia y confía en Dios que lo hará posible.
texts.en:
Saul 27 years old, and only studied up to 9th grade due to scarce economic resources. He is married, and his partner sells tortillas. He has two children, one of whom is in school, so there are three people in total who he supports. 

Saul makes a living working in a carpentry workshop, which he has done since childhood. He learned the trade out of curiosity, and continued because he liked it a lot. He also works in agriculture. He rides a bicycle 1 kilometer to get to work, and he works from 7:00 am to 5:00 pm, sometimes later if work is very busy. 

He is requesting the loan to buy a motorcycle, as he travels to other municipalities via bus, which takes a long time. 

His dream is to see his children grow up, to give them everything necessary so that they can become good people, and to have a better home for his family. He believes that God will help make this possible.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle, as he travels to other municipalities via bus, which takes a long time.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is an old client to the organization and has applied for a loan of 3,000,000 UGX. He is a father of three children who attend school. He operates a retail business which is his major source of income. He also sells coffee to supplement his income. His major challenge is limited capital which affects his operations. 
He joined Ugafode for financial assistance to boost his business and increase the profits he gets from his business. Francis is happy with Ugafode since it has enabled him to expand his business and he hopes that his business will expand more using this loan he took. He also encourages Ugafode to continue supporting low income earners. He needs the loan to buy scholastic materials that he will sell this back-to-school season.

loans.use: To buy scholastic materials

loans.name: Jesus Miguel

texts.es:
Jesus es una persona con muchos deseos de superación, tiene 30 años, es soltero y vive en Ica junto a su familia. Su mayor motivación en la vida son sus padres, es por ellos que siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace porque quiere brindarles un futuro mejor. El buen desempeño que tiene en su trabajo son el resultado de haber recibido una educación de calidad, haber crecido con muchos valores y trabajar siempre correctamente.
Jesus está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá acondicionar un espacio que le dieron sus padres y convertirlo en su cuarto, de esta manera tendrá mayor comodidad, mejorará su calidad de vida y seguirá luchando para terminar de construir su casa y crecer profesionalmente.
texts.en:
Jesus is a person who has a strong desire to succeed.  He is 30 years old, single, and lives in Ica with his family.  His main motivation in life is his parents; it is for them that he always exerts himself in everything he does so that they can have a better future.  The good work he does is the result of having received a quality education.  He grew up with good values, and he always does his work correctly. 

Jesus is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support they are providing he will be able to set up a space that his parents gave him and convert it into a room.  This way, he will have greater comfort, improving his quality of life.  He will continue to strive to finish building his house and to grow as a professional.

loans.use: to build a room

loans.name: Bumdari

texts.en:
Mrs. Bumdari, who is 57 years old, lives with her daughter and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been working as a cashier at a shoe shop since 2013. Her daughter works as a translator at an international organization. Her son studies at university. 

Mrs. Bumdari is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam for house renovations. After the renovation, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned for heating and fewer pollutants are released as a result.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam for house renovations

loans.name: Tserendondov

texts.en:
Tserendondov, who is 24 years old, lives with his brother and sisters in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been working as a barmen at a pub since 2009 while studying at university. His brother runs his private business, and his two sisters both go to high school. 

Tserendondov is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cement and fiberglass for house renovations. In this way his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and fewer pollutants are released into the air.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as bricks, cement and fiberglass for house renovations

loans.name: Leap

texts.en:
Leap is a 46-year-old woman. She has two dependent children who are currently in school and she also has one married child. She lives in the community of Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. To make a living and support her family, she grows rice and sells the crops to the local dealers. She is an active and honest rice farmer.

Leap wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from KIVA to build a latrine and buy its facilities. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Inocencia

texts.en:
Inocencia is a 30-year-old married woman with four children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Inocencia has a buy and sell livestock business in the Philippines. Inocencia requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional livestock to sell.

Inocencia has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, Inocencia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock to sell

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa is a married woman with nine children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Josefa is 52 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Josefa has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Josefa requested a17,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

Josefa has been in this business for 13 years. In the future, Josefa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Florida

texts.en:
Florida is 49 years old and married with four children.  

Florida is in the pig fattening business in the Philippines. Florida requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Florida has been in pig fattening for 13 years now, and has borrowed 23 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Florida would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es:
Marta de 40 años de edad, estudió hasta 7º grado, es viuda y no tiene hijos, ella vive con sus padres por lo tanto solo 2 personas dependen de ella.
	

Actualmente, ella  tiene un puesto de ropa en el mercado, además, se dedica a la crianza de ganado, su padre se involucra y le ayuda en el trabajo, para llegar al negocio de la venta de ropa se levanta muy temprano y se va en bus, y regresa a casa hasta las 6:00 pm


El dinero del préstamo lo necesita para  comprar ganado de repasto, ya que su padrele ayuda en este negocio pues es quien tiene la experiencia en este oficio.


Sus sueños son seguir ayudando a sus padres, tener un puesto de ropa en el mercado mas surtido y obtener mayores ingresos económicos, sabe que será un compromiso, pero con la ayuda de Dios lo hará posible.
texts.en:
Marta is 40 years old, studied up until 7th grade, and is a widow with no children. She lives with her parents, whom she supports. Currently, she has a clothing stall in the market, and she also raises cattle, which her father helps her with. 

To get to her clothing stall, she gets up very early and goes by bus, and returns home at 6:00 pm. She is requesting a loan to buy cattle to pasture, which her father will help her raise with his vast experience. 

Marta’s dreams are to continue helping her parents, increase the merchandise in her clothing stall, and increase her income. She knows it won’t be easy, but with God’s help, will be possible.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a 39-year-old married woman and has seven children, four of whom are currently in school.

Jocelyn is in the agricultural business, raising cattle in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy vitamins and vaccines for her cattle.

Jocelyn has been raising cattle for 3 years now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and vaccines for her cattle

loans.name: Dorjpalam

texts.en:
Dorjpalam is 39 years old and lives with his wife and two sons in Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. 

He has been working as a driver for a construction company since 2008. His wife works for a day care facility and looks after children aged five. Their sons go to high school. 

Using his previous loan, he has insulated his house with bricks and foam. Now he is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to buy vacuum insulated windows and hardwood flooring in order to reduce heat loss. If he can manage to reduce heat loss through the windows and floors, he can save money on coal. He will burn less coal for heating, releasing less pollutants into the air.

loans.use: to install vacuum insulated windows and hardwood flooring in order to reduce heat loss.

loans.name: Savon

texts.en:
Savon is a 37-year-old woman who lives in a remote area of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. At home, she is a lovely mother of two dependent children. To make a living, she opened a grocery store and her target customers are the people in her community. So far, she has been involved in this business for two years with the average earnings of $4.00 (USD) a day.

Savon wants to have household energy at a reduced monthly cost by purchasing a solar energy home system. Because there is inadequate money, she has requested a Kiva loan through its partner, HKL. After this initial investment, she hopes to have clean energy to power her household lights, TV and radio. 

Savon is very happy and thankful because with this loan HKL has provided her a special interest rate lower than its general loan rates. She awaits your kindness and relies on your generosity.

loans.use: to buy a solar energy home system

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en:
Juvy is 61 years old and married.

Juvy works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell in her general store.

Juvy has borrowed and paid 27 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from electronic mobile load retailing.

Juvy aspires to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.en:
Aurelia is 53 years old and widowed with six children.  

Aurelia is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Aurelia requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Aurelia has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Aurelia would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 45 years old and married with six children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Lucy is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Lucy has been in pig fattening for 10 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Maricar

texts.en:
Maricar is 34 years old, married, and has three children who are in school.

Maricar is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Maricar requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds, vitamins and vaccines for her pigs.

Maricar has been raising pigs for 3 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Maricar would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, vitamins and vaccines for her pigs

loans.name: Channa

texts.en: Channa is 31 years old, a single woman who lives with her parents in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She is a sophomore at a university, majoring in accounting. She is an active and thoughtful student. Channa has two years more to go finish her studies. Unfortunately, she is no longer able to pay her university fees. To pursue her dream of becoming as an accountant, she would like to apply for a KIVA loan to pay her fees. With the support of this loan, she hopes that she can keep going with her studies and reduce her family’s worries. She is very happy and thankful to all lenders for this loan, which will seriously motivate her to proceed with her education. She expects to have a well-paid job after graduating with this degree.

loans.use: to pay for her university fees.

loans.name: Joylyn

texts.en:
Joylyn is 25 years old, married, and had a child. Her spouse is a technician, while she manages a store for income. She sells grocery items to the people in her village. She wanted to earn more income to develop her sales and keep improving the business. 

Joylyn is now asking for a loan of P12,000 to buy sardines, soft drinks, biscuits, soap and shampoo to sell. 

She hopes to continue selling good merchandise and earning profits for education purposes.

loans.use: to buy sardines, soft drinks, biscuits, soap and shampoo

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 48 years old and married with nine children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Myrna is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase additional livestock, feed and other supplies for her business.  Myrna has been raising livestock for one  year, and also earns additional income from gasoline retailing.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock, feed and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Melodina

texts.en:
Melodina is 45 years old, widowed, and has six children; two children are currently in school.

Melodina is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Melodina requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy vitamins and vaccines for her livestock.

Melodina has been raising livestock for 20 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Melodina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and vaccines for her livestock

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en: Myrna is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Myrna is 49 years old and has four children who are currently in school. She has a business buying and selling livestock in the Philippines. Myrna applied for a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional livestock to sell. Myrna has been in this business for 17 years. In the future, Myrna would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock to sell.

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is 28 years old, married, and has three children; two children are currently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Michelle has a buy and sell peanuts business in the Philippines. Michelle requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional sacks of peanuts to sell.

Michelle has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, Michelle would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of peanuts to sell

loans.name: Milagrina

texts.en:
Milagrina works hard to support her family. Milagrina is married and has a sewing business in the Philippines.

Milagrina requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials like threads, zippers, and fabric for her business.

Milagrina has been in this business for 10 years now.

Milagrina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like threads, zippers, and fabric for her business

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is a 43-year-old married woman with nine children; four children are currently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Vilma has a food vending business in the Philippines. Vilma requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Vilma has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Vilma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Rosela

texts.en:
Rosela is 30 years old, married, and has four children; two children are currently in school.

Rosela is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosela requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosela has been raising pigs for 4 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Rosela would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita works hard to support her family. She is married, and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Anecita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

She has been in this business for seven years now.

In the future, Anecita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en: Elvira is 47 years old and has four children, who are in school. She Elvira is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Elvira applied for a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has been in pig fattening for seven years, and she has borrowed from NWTF twice before to sustain her business. In the future, Elvira would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Dinora Del Rosario

texts.es:
Dinora de 43 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto  grado ya que en ese momento  no pensaba que el estudio  le iba servir en un futuro, está acompañada y su esposo es empleado de construcción, tiene 3 hijos pero todos han formado sus propios hogares y por lo tanto nadie depende de ella.


Dinora es costurera, la actividad la realiza desde muy pequeña y lo aprendió de su madre,  además posee un molino que ha comprado con mucho esfuerzo y que también le sirve como un ingreso extra ya que presta sus servicios a los habitantes, como el negocio lo tiene en su casa, ella se levanta muy temprano a atender el molino y ha hacer el desayuno para que su pareja salga a trabajar, seguidamente hace sus trabajos de confección y al mismo tiempo atiende el molino.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una motocicleta para su hijo para que llegue mas rápido a su trabajo y no se transporte en bus.

Sus sueños son tener una mejor vivienda, comprar un molino mas grande con el cual pueda atender mas clientes y de esa forma tener mayores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Dinora is 43 years old. She studied through 6th grade because at the time she did not think that school would serve her in the future. She is married and her husband is a construction worker. She has 3 children but all of them have made their own households and thus no one depends on her.

Dinora is a seamstress, an activity she learned from her mother as a young girl and has done since. She also has a mill that she has purchased with much effort and that serves as an extra source of income as she lends its services to local residents. Since her business is at her house, she gets up very early to tend the mill and make breakfast so her spouse can leave for work, after which she does her clothing work and at the same time attends to the mill.

She needs the loan to buy a motorcycle for her son so he can get to work faster and no longer use the bus.

Her dreams are to have better housing, and to buy a larger mill with which she can serve more customers, and hence make more income.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for her son so he can get to work faster and no longer use the bus.

loans.name: Rogiel

texts.en:
Rogiel is married and works hard to support her family. Rogiel has a business raising livestock in the Philippines.

Rogiel requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional livestock and other supplies for her business.

Rogiel has been in this business for 15 years now.

Rogiel would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.en:
Rosenda is 53 years old, widowed, and has eight children; three children are still in school.

Rosenda is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Rosenda requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosenda has been in pig fattening for 1 year now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosenda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes works hard to support her family. Agnes is married, and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Agnes requested a PHP 27,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.  Agnes has been in this business for five years now.

Agnes would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is 51 years old and has three children. She is married, and has one child who is still in school.

Conchita is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Conchita has been in pig fattening for seven years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Conchita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Jacqueline works hard to support her family.

She has a business selling ornamental plants in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Jacqueline is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase more materials and flowers for her business selling ornamental plants.

Jacqueline has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more materials and flowers for her business.

loans.name: Arlle Jane

texts.en: Arlle Jane is single and has a general store business in the Philippines. She applied for a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her store. Arlle Jane has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Arlle Jane would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Haide

texts.en:
Haide is a 40-year-old married woman with four children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Haide has a raising livestock business in the Philippines. Haide requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional livestock for her business.

Haide has been in this business for 12 years. Haide would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock for her business

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is a hardworking entrepreneur, who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to buy more items like canned goods, chocolate drink, creamer, cereals, diapers, beers, soft drinks, etc. to sell in her general store business.  Elsa has been in this business for eight years. Elsa earns more income from raising pigs.  She successfully paid back her previous loan, and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business.

Elsa has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items like canned goods, chocolate drink, creamer, cereals, diapers, beers, soft drinks, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Yeat

texts.en:
Yeat is a 38-year-old woman and she has two dependent children who are currently in school. She lives in a remote area of Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. To make a living and support her family, she grows rice and sells the crops to the local dealers. She is an active and honest rice farmer who can make a net profit around USD 3.00 a day.

Yeat wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from KIVA to build a latrine and buy the materials. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL, with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is managing a retail store for income. She lived with her family at Piat. She is 38 years old and had three children. All are studying and in need of a daily allowance. She gets it through her income from the retail store. 

Hellen wanted to sell more merchandise, but she needs additional capital to buy soft drinks, coffee, sugar, assorted biscuits and noodles. She is asking for P12,000. 

Hellen hopes to keep improving her business to sustain all their needs and save funds for education purposes.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, coffee, sugar, assorted biscuits, and noodles

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is 53 years old and married with one child.

She earns a living by her business of selling ornamental plants in the Philippines. Conchita is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials like flower pots, fertilizer, flowers, etc. for her business.

Conchita has been in this business for five years, and also earns additional income from raising livestock.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like flower pots, fertilizer, flowers, etc. for her business

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more items and ingredients for her business. Evangeline has been in this business for five years. Evangeline earns additional income from electronic mobile load retailing.

Evangeline has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more items and ingredients for her business

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.en:
Aurelia is 59 years old and married with seven children. Aurelia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 24,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Aurelia has borrowed and repaid 15 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns additional income from vulcanizing shop and raising pigs. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Aurelia aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Chanthy

texts.en:
Chanthy is a 42-year-old woman. She has two dependent children who are currently in school and she also has one married child. She lives in the community of Tboung Khmum Province, Cambodia. She is an active and honest farmer who can make a net profit around USD 3.00 a day. So far, she has been in this career for fifteen years.

Chanthy wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from KIVA to build a latrine and buy the materials. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL, with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Elcin

texts.en:
Elcin is a 26-year-old married man and has one daughter. His family is IDP and they live in an IDP settlement. His wife is a housekeeper. 

Elcin has raised animals for 5 years, such as sheep and cows. He sells milk, meat, and sheep wool at the local bazaar and earns 230 AZN monthly.

The region where he lives is very cold in autumn. That’s why the people's demand for wool is very high. They make coats, jackets, gloves, and socks to keep themselves warm. People use meat to prepare dishes every day and drink milk because it is very useful for health.

Elcin wants to increase his income because his current earnings are not enough to cover life's demands. He applied for a 1,000 AZN loan in order to buy more animals to raise.

loans.use: to buy more husbandries.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Wonderful Kiva lenders! Introducing Edwin, who is honest, hardworking and a loving father of one boy and one girl. He hails from Seretut, a remote village in the Kericho area of Kenya. The Kericho area is famous for producing world class elite runners. For the past four years he has actively been involved in mixed farming, a skill he inherited from his parents. His primary sources of income are tea farming, egg selling and dairy. Of all the activities he is involved in, he passionately loves poultry farming. Poultry farming is a profitable business venture in Kenya and is one of those businesses that can be done on a part time basis to earn extra income. Although he enjoys poultry farming, the meager income he earns from poultry farming is not sufficient to satisfy his family. He wants to increase his poultry so that he can reap maximum profits. 

He is requesting a loan to buy additional poultry. He intends to buy a high quality breed of poultry that will be laying between 3-5 crates of eggs daily. A crate of eggs fetches $5 and with five crates he will be making $25 US a day which will boost his income greatly. Increased income will allow Edwin to provide a secure future for his children and improve on his family's living conditions. Other than increased profits, he will also benefit from selling poultry meat and poultry feathers.

loans.use: to buy additional poultry.

loans.name: Nelda

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Nelda works hard to support her family. She has a business direct selling Avon, MSE and Natasha products in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling ready-to-wear. Nelda is borrowing 23,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more products like shoes, body sprays, lotions, soap, etc., to sell to her customers.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Nelda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more products like shoes, body sprays, lotions, soap, etc., to sell to her customers

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe works hard to support her family. Fe is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Fe requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. She has been in this business for 15 years now.

Fe would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Zarifa

texts.en:
Zarifa is 56 years old, married, and has five kids. She  has run a local grocery store for more than 36   years. In her store, she sells different grocery products.  Zarifa  is the only breadwinner in the family. Her husband and sons help  her in organizing her business.

To be able to keep her small business functioning in a sustainable way, she needs to make some investments. A loan of 1500 AZN will be a huge support to this hard-working woman and her family, and will enable her to purchase more grocery products to resell in her store. The latter will make Zarifa's store more competitive. Zaifa relies on the goodwill of the lenders and she will be thankful to them for supporting her in sustaining and developing her small business.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery products

loans.name: Las Cochitas Group

texts.es:
“Las Cochitas” es un grupo formado por 8 personas, todas ellas mujeres. El grupo está ubicado en una pequeña comunidad ubicada sobre la carretera y justo frente a una presa de pesca. Las integrantes invertirán su crédito en: María, Eleuteria, Modesta y Birginia, en sus tiendas de abarrotes; Beatriz en la elaboraciónn de piñatas; Ana Luisa y Felipa, en borregos y Jhoana, en ropa.

Doña María tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes desde hace doce años, ella vive en unión libre con el señor Juan y tienen una familia de tres niños los cuales asisten a la escuela. La tienda la iniciócon un préstamo de otra microfinanciera, en aquél entonces lo que más vendía eran dulces. Con el tiempo notó que sus ganancias eran muy buenas y decidió invertir en otros productos como: alimentos enlatados, refrescos, azúcar, etc. 
Después, escuchó hablar de VisiónFund México y le agradó mucho la idea de solicitar un nuevo préstamo con mejores beneficios para hacer crecer su negocio y lo obtuvo sin ningún problema. María lleva ya varios ciclos trabajando con la institución y platica que gracias al apoyo ha podido mejorar su vivienda y sus niños pueden asistir a la escuela sin ningún problema. 
El nuevo préstamo lo necesita para comprar más productos de abarrotes y aprovechar la nueva temporada que se avecina ya que sabe que con la entrada de los niños al nievo ciclo escolar, sus ganancias aumentarán. María comprará leche, pan, huevo, refresco, etc. 
Para María, la meta es seguir mejorando en su negocio para beneficio de sus niños. 

*En la imagen: María viste un suéter morado y aparece hincada. En la fotografía aparecen 9 personas que inicialmente recibirían el crédito, pero al final la segunda persona de derecha a izquierda ya no renovó ciclo en la institución.
texts.en:
“Las Conchitas” (The Little Shells) is a communal bank made up of 8 people, all of them women.  The communal bank is located in a small community near a highway and right next to a dam where people fish.  The members will invest their loans in the following ways:  María, Eleuteria, Modesta and Birginia will invest in their small groceries; Beatriz will invest in making piñatas; Ana Luisa and Felipa will invest in sheep; and Jhoana will invest in clothing. 

María has had a little grocery shop for twelve years.  She is married to señor Juan, and they have three children, all of whom go to school.  She started the shop with a loan from a different micro-lender.  Back then, she mostly sold sweets.  Over time María noticed that her earnings were quite good, and she decided to invest in other products, such as canned goods, sodas, sugar etc. 
 
After hearing about VisiónFund México and liking the idea of requesting a new loan with better benefits to help her business grow, María had no trouble getting the loan.  María has now been working with the institution for a number of lending cycles.  She says that thanks to their help, she has been able to make improvements to her home and has no trouble sending her children to school.  
 
María needs the new loan to purchase more grocery products so she can take advantage of the new season that is approaching.  She knows that with the start of the new school term, her profits will increase.  María will purchase milk, bread, eggs, sodas etc.
 
María's goal is to keep improving her business for the benefit of her children.  

*In the above photo, María is wearing a purple sweater and is kneeling down. There are 9 people in this photo because the second woman on the right was part of the original group, although this round only 8 members of the group requested a loan.

loans.use: to purchase milk, bread, eggs, sodas etc.

loans.name: Azada

texts.en:
Azada is a 53-year-old widow with two children. She is trying to raise her children without feeling the absence of their father too much.  Azada raises and sells seasonal vegetables such as pumpkins, cucumbers, potatoes and so on. She has been raising them and selling them at local bazaar for 33 years and has good experience in this area. Her monthly income is 145 AZN.

Vegetables are in high demand in Azerbaijan because people like to use them for fresh salads and delicious national dishes. They shop at local groceries and buy fresh and tasty vegetables. They know that vegetables raised in private gardens are always fresh and without pesticides.

Azada needs money to cover her family’s needs. She applied for 1200 AZN in order to supply quality fertilizers and increase her harvest and income.

loans.use: to supply quality fertilizers and increase harvest and income.

loans.name: Maria Adela

texts.es: María de 36 años de edad  vive en casa propia  con su compañero de vida, el cual la apoya con los gastos de la casa,  ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela, con lo que ella gana de sus ventas y la ayuda del esposo logran  solventar las necesidades de su  hogar, María quiere mejorar su vivienda poniendo techo nuevo pero con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para comprar laminas, hierro, polines  y pago de mano de obra y asi poder cambien el techo para que ella y su familia puedan vivir seguros y cómodos.
texts.en: 36-year-old María lives in her own house with her life partner, who helps her with the household expenses. She has a small store located in her place of residence, and has many customers; with her gains from sales and the help of her husband they manage to solve the needs of her household. María wants to improve her household by putting in a new ceiling, but with what she earns she won't be able to reach this goal. For this reason she asks INTEGRAL for a loan to buy sheeting, iron, and pallets, and pay for manual labor to change the ceiling so she and her family can live safely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy sheeting, iron, pallets, and pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy inputs for crop sanitation for olive trees

loans.name: Joseph Glen

texts.en:
Joseph Glen works hard to support his family. Joseph Glen is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. he has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in his general store. Joseph Glen has been in this business for 15 years now.

Joseph Glen would like to save enough to provide a secure future for his family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in his general store

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan, ha logrado tener su negocio más rentable y con mayores posibilidades de crecer, esto es posible por la buena inversión del crédito anterior, sus condiciones económicas y su estilo de vida personal han cambiado positivamente, ya ha cancelado su deuda con  buena calificación crediticia.
Para Juan los créditos son herramientas muy útiles para mantener su negocio funcionando por ello se decidió por un  nuevo préstamo que invertirá en la compra de  ganado de repasto e insumos agrícolas, mejorara la ganadería y cultivara granos básicos con los que tendrá alimento para su consumo y comercializar.
texts.en:
Juan has increased the profitability of his business and made it possible for it to continue to grow. This was due to his wise use of the previous loan. His financial situation and his life style have changed for the better and he has paid off his debt and earned a good credit rating.

For Juan, loans are very useful tools to keep his business running and that is why he decided to request another loan. He will invest the money in the purchase of pasture cattle and agricultural supplies; he will improve the cattle and grow basic grains which will provide food for his consumption and for sale.

loans.use: to buy pasture cattle and agricultural supplies so he can improve the cattle and grow basic grains which will provide food for his use and for sale.

loans.name: Emanuel Group

texts.es:
ROSA tiene 22 años de edad - vive en San Lorenzo con su esposo y 2 hijos- sus hijos asisten a la escuela y gozan de buena salud.
desde que ROSA tenía 9 años, se dedica a la tarea de extracción de este crustáceo en las profundidades del manglar - nos comenta - que se levanta muy temprano para dejar cocinando los alimentos que consumirán sus hijos durante el día - hasta la tarde que ella regresa. en una pequeña embarcación se trasladan hasta la frontera con Colombia donde inicia la jornada de trabajo - las raíces del manglar no permiten que las personas pasen hasta los adentros del manglar y muchas veces se encuentran con serpientes  venenosas, pejesapos y otros animales que hacen daño. en ocasiones se les han sustraído sus embarcaciones y hasta el mismo producto del trabajo diario.
con este crédito ROSA desea mejorar su actividad. siendo ella quien compre la concha a las personas que se dedican a esta tarea y evitar los peligros del manglar. de esta forma pasara mas tiempo con sus hijos y apoyarlos en  la realización de las tareas de la escuela.
texts.en:
ROSA is 22 years old and lives in San Lorenzo with her husband and two children.  Their children attend school and are in good health.  Since the time she was 9 years old, Rosa has worked extracting crustaceans from the mangrove swamps.  She tells us that she gets up very early in order to prepare food for her children for the day, and she returns late. In a small boat they travel to the border with Colombia where they begin their work - the roots of the swamps do not permit people to enter into the mangroves and many times they encounter poisonous snakes, frog fish and other animals that cause harm. At times these creatures have overturned the boats and even made away with the produce of a days labor.  

With this loan Rosa hopes to increase her business.  She will be the person who will buy the shells from people who work in this area, and thus avoid the dangers of the mangrove. She will also pay a more just wage. In this way she will be able to spend time with her children and support them in completing their school work.

loans.use: To purchase shells from friends who work in this field (harvesting shellfish from mangrove swamps) with the aim of paying a more just wage.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Ivan está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería industrial, es una persona que está luchando por poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
El quiere terminar su carrera y trabajar en su profesión, está estudiando y también trabaja al mismo tiempo, ya que es la única forma de poder salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de su tesis, ya que de esa forma podrá cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
texts.en: Ivan is studying Industrial Engineering. He is a person who is striving to improve his living conditions and that of his family. He wants to finish his studies and work in his profession. He is working and studying at the same time as that is the only way for him to get ahead. He is requesting this loan to invest in paying for his thesis as in this way he can afford to pay this expense that he has.

loans.use: to pay for his thesis.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.en:
After getting laid off from her retail Job, Bertha joined a gym and started doing Zumba. She fell in love with it, and found it very therapeutic. When an instructor of hers suggested that she get certified, she saw this as an opportunity to start her own business. Upon completing her certification, she launched her Zumba classes from her garage with three people.  

When her growing base of clients encouraged her to expand into a retail space, Bertha began talks with a local property owner to try to secure a space. When he asked her for her business plan, she told him that she did not have one. Instead of turning her away, the property manager gave her a chance and asked her to write down her business dreams on paper. She wrote a heartfelt report of how much she wanted to help her community and delivered her dreams to him with anticipation. 

A few days later, he told her that they wanted to take a chance on her and rent the space to her. They felt that a Zumba studio would be a particularly good fit for the space, as there was a bridal shop next door. They helped her with build-out and even gave her three months’ rent free. Lotus Fitness and Wellness Center was born!

Bertha will use her Kiva loan to purchase ten exercise bicycles to start a cycling class. This will allow her to offer a different type of class from her Zumba staple, increasing the appeal of her studio and attracting a wider client base.

With the help of Kiva lenders, Bertha hopes to open up a safe space for community members to exercise and better their health.

loans.use: to purchase ten exercise bicycles to start a cycling class.

loans.name: Andrea Grimaneza

texts.es: Andrea es casada y tiene un bebe de 1 año y una hija de 7 años que asiste a la escuela, ella desde hace un año se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, su esposo trabaja de guardia de seguridad,  comenta Andrea que vive en la casa de su madre y ahí es donde tiene sus animales, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y gallinas para obtener algo de ingresos para ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar, lo que Andrea aspira es trabajar por sus hijos y darles una buena educación.
texts.en:
Andrea is married and has a year-old baby and a seven-year-old daughter who attends. school.  For a year Andrea has been raising small animals.  Her husband works as a security guard.  She lives in her mother's home where she keeps the animals.

The loan will be used to buy chickens and hens to earn a little income to help her husband cover the household expenses.  Andrea's goal is to work for her children and give them a good education.

loans.use: To buy chickens to earn a higher income.

loans.name: Yudi

texts.es:
Yudi es una joven emprendedora, tiene 27 años de edad, es soltera y vive en San Martin junto a su familia.
Es madre soltera de un maravilloso niño de 6 años, siempre ha luchado para poder brindarle un futuro mejor a su pequeño, a pesar de todas las adversidades atravesadas ha salido adelante. Desde hace más de 2 años viene desempeñándose como empleada del hogar y le va bien porque trabaja con mucho empeño, dedicación y entusiasmo.
Yudi quiere mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, es por ello que está muya agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá pintarrajear las paredes de su casa, de esta manera vivirá en un ambiente más cómodo y seguirá luchando para brindarle una educación de calidad a su hijo.
texts.en:
Yudi is an enterprising young woman. She is 27 years old, is single, and lives in San Martin with her family.

She is a single mother of a marvelous six-year-old son. She has always fought to be able to offer a better future to her son. In spite of all of the adversities, she has gone forward. For more than 2 years, she has been working as a domestic employee, and it is going well because she works with a lot of determination, dedication, and enthusiasm. 

Yudi wants to improve her family’s quality of life. As a result, she is very thankful for Kiva loans because with the support that they have brought her, she has been able to paint the walls of her house. In this way, she will live in a more comfortable place and will continue fighting to offer a high-quality education to her son.

loans.use: to paint the walls of her house

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
El señor Guillermo es dueño de una hamburguesería, se dedica a esta actividad hace más de 3 años, vive en casa de sus padres en la ciudad de Pilar, es soltero y no tiene hijos, pero le gustaría poder formar una familia.
Es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora y que quiere salir adelante y seguir trabajando, para mejorar sus ingresos por medio de su propio esfuerzo.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar hamburguesas al por mayor, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir invirtiendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Guillermo is a young man who owns a hamburger shop, which he has been working at for the past three years. He lives at home with his parents in the city of Pilar, he is single and he does not have children, but he would like to have a family.

He is a hard-working person and entrepreneur who would like to continue working and be successful, in order to increase his earnings through his own efforts.

He is requesting this loan to be able to buy hamburgers in bulk, since this will allow him to continue investing in his business.

loans.use: to buy hamburgers in bulk for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a large amount of wood inventory so as to continue running his business smoothly

loans.name: Elda Marleny

texts.es:
Elda, ha logrado mantener activo su negocio de venta tortillas y de leña, generando ingresos con los que ha mejorado el estilo de vida familiar, ha cancelado sus deudas y está poniendo en marcha un nuevo rubro para tener una situación económica más favorable, su nuevo proyecto consiste en crear un vivero de plantas ornamentales y frutales para ofrecer nuevos productos a sus clientes.
Se ha decidido por un nuevo crédito para invertirlo en la compra de leña al por mayor y continuar progresando, espera que los resultados de la inversión sean tan positivos como los del crédito anterior.
texts.en:
Elda has succeeded in keeping her business of selling tortillas and firewood active, generating income with which she has improved her family's lifestyle. She has paid debts and is launching a new business sector to create a more favorable economic situation. Her new project consists in creating a nursery for ornamental plants and fruits to offer new products to her customers.

She has decided on a new loan to invest it to buy firewood wholesale and continue progressing; she hopes that the results of the investment be as positive as those of the previous loan.

loans.use: to buy firewood wholesale and continue progressing.

loans.name: Saed

texts.en:
Saed is a 29-year-old married man with three children, living with his family in a rented house in Hodeidah City, Yemen. He is an educated man with secondary education. The rented house where he lives with his family costs him a lot of money that he pays for rent. In order to save that money, Saed decided to build his own house, by time he could accumulate a good amount of money and purchase a piece of land. His wife supported him with a lot of her own money.

The husband is the sole breadwinner for the family and his income is not enough to cover all the expenses of the building. Saed and his wife built their own house on the land they bought. But it still is not completed and most of the rooms are not renovated from the inside. As a result, Saed is requesting a loan of 155,000 YER from AMB. He will use the loan to purchase construction materials such as cement and bricks in order to complete the building of the rooms and to renovate them from the inside in order to make them suitable for living. 

Saed's dream in the future is building one more floor and renovating the rooms to make his house more comfortable and suitable.to live in.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as cement and bricks in order to complete the building of rooms and to renovate them.

loans.name: Jose Alejandro

texts.es: José tiene 28 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeña hija de 9 años de edad. José trabaja en una empresa cercana a su localidad lo cual le permite llevar el sustento diario a su familia. José  es un hombre muy visionario quien junto a su compañera quien se es pequeña comerciante sostienen la economía del hogar. José solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea construir las paredes de un cuarto para lo cual necesita materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y de esta forma poder mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en: José is 28 years old and lives in his own house with his life companion and his young daughter of 9 years. José works for a company very near to his home, which allows him to provide for his family. José is a very visionary man who, together with his partner who is also a small merchant, supports the household economy. José asks this loan of FUSAI because he desires to construct the walls of a room, for which he needs materials such as: bricks, cement, sand, and iron. He hopes to be able to count on this financing and in this way he can improve his housing conditions.

loans.use: to buy: bricks, cement, sand, and iron to make the walls of a room.

loans.name: Katia

texts.es:
Katia tiene 43 años, es conviviente, vive en casa propia junto a hijo, nieto y esposo. Ella tiene familia unida. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia; la misma que esta ubicada en la provincia de chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Katia se dedica a la venta de productos de abarrotes y a la crianza de animales de corral tales como patos, pollos, pavos, entre otros. Su esposo es trabajador dependiente de la empresa Cayati, maneja mototaxi y vende panca por las tardes. Ella necesita el préstamo para la inversión en compra de animales para criar y vender. Con ello tendrá mayor venta y atención a clientes y así poder generar ingresos para una mejora en calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Katia is 43 years old. She married and lives in her own house, along with her son, grandson, and husband. She has a close-knit family. She lives in a community that works in commerce, agriculture, and cattle raising. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, on the northern coast of Peru.

Katia has a business selling grocery products and raises small animals like ducks, chickens, turkeys, and others. Her husband works for a business called Cayati. He drives a motorcycle taxi and sells panca chili peppers in the afternoons. She needs the loan to buy animals to raise and sell. With this she will have more sales and can respond to more customers so she can generate income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for ducks, chickens, turkeys, and other small animals to grow and sell them

loans.name: Julio

texts.en:
Julio has always had a passion for books and found work with small publishers in the US. While building his networks in the industry, he regularly ran into people who were interested in finding difficult-to-acquire books from Latin America. Eventually, he realized there was a huge demand for Spanish language books in the United States and decided to launch an Internet book retail business specializing in books from Mexico and Argentina.

Mi Lybro currently employs over twelve people who gather ordered books from their countries of origin and ship them to the US, where they are mailed out to customers. Julio has worked extremely hard to build a reliable network of people to ensure that his customers get their purchases in a timely manner.

As Julio continues to build out his Stateside branch of his business, he became aware of the necessity of establishing and building credit in the US. He sought out a microloan from Accion and Kiva, and will utilize his loan to build a back-end website that will streamline the logistics of his import business.

As the numbers of Spanish speakers continue to increase in the US, there will be an increasing demand for businesses like Mi Lybro, and according to Julio, there are very few businesses that are doing what he is doing. He hopes to become the preeminent distributor of Spanish books in the US and even open his own US-based publishing house to translate popular English titles into Spanish.

loans.use: to build a back-end website that will streamline the logistics of his book import business.

loans.name: Yashar

texts.en:
Yashar is a 26-year-old single man. He lives with his parents. He is going to get married next year. The source of the family’s income is gardening. He has been working in this field for five years and has good experience. His monthly income is 200 AZN.

Yashar raises seasonal vegetables, such as cucumbers, pumpkins, onions, greens, tomatoes and potatoes, and then sells them at a local bazaar. But he has a problem with water because every time he gets water from a neighbor. For this reason, he is asking for a loan of 1,200 AZN so that he can obtain a water pump to irrigate and expand his crops.

Yashar is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their support, he will be able to buy a water pump.

loans.use: to buy a water pump to irrigate and expand his crops.

loans.name: Silvia Haydee

texts.es: Silvia tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos. Ella es la responsable de su hogar dado que hace algunos años se separo de su esposo. Silvia  es una mujer emprendedora quien desde hace dos años se gana la vida por medio de la venta de tirtillas en el mercado central de su localidad. Silvia desea  construir un cerco perimetral en su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de postes de cemento, arena, lamina, alambre de púas, etc. Espera poder tener este crédito y así poder dar inicio a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: Silvia is 33 years old and lives in her own home with her three children. She is the sole supporter of her home as she and her husband separated some years ago. Silvia is an enterprising woman who for the past two years has earned a living selling tortillas in the local central market. Silvia wants to construct a perimeter fence around her home so she asked for a loan from FUSAI to buy cement posts, sand, sheet metal, barbed wire, etc. She hopes to have this loan and be able to start the improvement as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement posts, sand, sheet metal, barbed wire to construct a perimeter fence.

loans.name: Mehriniso

texts.ru: Мехринисо 45 лет. Она в течение 15 лет работает медсестрой в больнице своего района Фархор. Муж Мехринисо работает кредитным офицером в местном банке. Сейчас его жена - Мехринисо планирует начать новый бизнес в сфере животноводства. Мехринисо этот бизнес будет вести параллельно со своей работой. Ей будут помогать ее дети - старший сын и дочь. Мехринисо имеет коровник, запаслась кормом для скотов, теперь осталось закупить самих скотов. Для этой покупки ее начального капитала не хватает, поэтому Мехиринисо берет кредит для того, чтобы приобрести 5 голов крупнорогатого скота. Она надеется на поддержку. Мехринисо начинает этот бизнес, чтобы улучшить финансовое положение семьи.
texts.en:
Mehriniso is 45 years old.  For the past 15 years she has been working as a nurse at the hospital located in her own district (Farkhor district).  Her husband works as a loan officer for a local bank.  Mehriniso is now planning to start a new business in the field of animal husbandry.  She will be running this business in addition to her current work, and will be helped by her children: her oldest son and her daughter.

Mehriniso already has a barn, stocked with feed for her cattle, so the only thing she still needs to do is to buy cattle.  Her starting capital is not sufficient to make this purchase, and this is the reason why she is taking a loan, which will allow her to buy five head of cattle.  Mehriniso is hoping to receive some support.  Her plan is to start this new business in order to improve her family's financial situation.

loans.use: to buy five head of cattle in order to start her new business.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en: Arlene works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. Arlene has requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store. She has been in this business for 20 years now. Arlene would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es:
José de 57 años de edad, estudió hasta 7º grado, debido a la situación económica de su familia no pudo continuar, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen dos hijos por lo que son 3 personas las que dependen de él.


José actualmente trabaja en la agricultura y lo ha hecho desde niño, lo aprendió de su padre pues siempre lo acompañaba al campo, además tiene un camión con el cual hace viajes en su cantón y le genera un ingreso extra, para llegar a la parcela donde cultiva debe trasladarse a 1 kilómetro y medio desde muy temprano.


Él necesita el crédito para invertir en la siembra de maíz y para comprar algunos repuestos para su camión.


José desea ven crecer a sus hijos, darles todo lo necesario para que ellos puedan tener una mejor vida de la que él tuvo, mejorar su vivienda y seguir trabajando.
texts.en: José is 57 years old, completed 7th grade in school and couldn't continue on due to his family's economic situation. He is married and his spouse is a housewife. They have two children, so there are three people dependent upon him. José today works farming, something he has done since his childhood, having learned from his father having always accompanied his father to the field. in addition he has a truck with which he makes trips in his region and generates some extra income. To arrive at his farmland where he grows crops he has to go 1.5 kilometers early in the morning. He needs the loan to invest in corn seed and to buy some parts for his truck. José wishes to see his children grow up, given them everything they need to have a better life than he, make home improvements, and to continue working.

loans.use: to invest in corn seed and to buy some parts for his truck.

loans.name: Ramzan

texts.en:
Ramzan is a 50-year-old, active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. He lives in Rawalpindi Pakistan with his family. He is a father of three children, and he is the only one responsible to manage his entire household and fulfill the needs of his family.

Ramzan has been running a wholesale curtain shop for many years. He wants to increase his business by purchasing cloth in bulk for curtain making purposes. But due to insufficient financial resources, he is unable to buy cloth in bulk. Therefore, Ramzan has applied for a Kiva loan from BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan amount he will purchase cloth in bulk and fulfill this business need.

For this financial support, Ramzan is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan

loans.use: to purchase cloth in bulk for his curtain selling business.

loans.name: Zohour Al Basateen Group

texts.en:
Iman is the featured borrower for Zohour Al Basateen Group. She got together with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan, because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and live at the same time.

Iman is a 48-year-old Syrian refugee, and married mother of two children. She decided to use her seven years of experience in the handcrafts field, in attempt to rescue her beloved family from the low financial, social, and humanitarian situation of Syrian refugees in Lebanon. Thus she started working to make handcrafts at home and sell them to cover the needs and expenses of her family.Today, Iman is working hard to develop her business, and for this reason her acquired loan will be invested in increasing her merchandise by buying necessary materials for her handcrafts business.

Iman is the first lady at the left side of the picture. As for the other group members, Soumaya is the second from the left, and Aida is the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy necessary materials for her handcraft business.

loans.name: Gunay

texts.en:
Gunay is 31 years old, single, and she lives with her parents. Gunay’s father is a butcher, but earnings from this job aren’t enough and the main source of income for family is farming.  Gunay raises and sells seasonal vegetables such as pumpkins, cucumbers, potatoes and so on. She has been raising them and selling at a local bazaar for seven years, and has good experience in this area. Her monthly income is 150 AZN.

Vegetables are in high demand in Azerbaijan, because people like to use them for fresh salads and delicious national dishes. They attend local groceries and buy their fresh and tasty vegetables. They know that vegetables raised in private gardens are always fresh and without pesticides. Gunay needs money to cover the family’s demands. She applied for 1200 AZN in order to purchase quality fertilizers and increase the harvest and income.

loans.use: to purchase quality fertilizers.

loans.name: Roxana Elizabeth

texts.es: Roxana tiene 47 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 20 años y 10 años de edad. Roxana tiene 8 años de dedicarse a la compra y venta de ropa nueva la cual la comercializa de forma ambulante y en su casa. Roxana es una mujer visionaria quien desea mejor sus condiciones habitacionales por lo ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de las paredes del baño dado que actualmente lo tiene cubierto con cortinas tal como se observa en la fotografía. Con el crédito comprará cemento, ladrillo, arena, hierro y una puerta para mejorar las condiciones del baño lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Roxana, age 47, lives in her own house with her two children, ages 20 and 10.  Roxana has been buying and selling new clothes for eight years.  She sells in an itinerant manner and at her house.  

Roxana is a visionary woman who wishes to improve her housing conditions.  Therefore, she has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to build the bathroom walls that are currently covered with curtains, as seen in the photo.  

She will use the loan to buy cement, bricks, sand, metal, and a door in order to improve the condition of the bathroom as soon as possible.

loans.use: o buy cement, bricks, sand, metal, and a door.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es: María de 43 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus  hijos en casa de propia, ella posee una tienda en la cual sus hijos le ayudan, el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias y la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar las necesidades de su hogar,  María  solicita un crédito para la compra de mercadería como por ejemplo: arroz, frijoles, avena, azúcar, huevos, etc. para surtir su tienda y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: María, 43 years old, lives with her life partner and their children in their own house. She has a store that her children help her with. Her business is located in her home; with what she makes from sales and the help of her husband they manage to fulfill the needs of their household. María asks a loan to buy merchandise such as: rice, beans, oats, sugar, eggs, etc. to fill her store and provide more stable finances for her family.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oats, sugar, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Carlota Del Carmen

texts.es:
Carlota   de 54 años de edad, por sus escasos recursos económicos no estudió ningún grado, ella  era la mayor de sus hermanos y tenía que ayudarle a su madre a trabajar porque su padre los abandonó cuando era muy pequeña y su familia era muy pobre, está acompañada y su compañero de vida trabaja con ella en la agricultura, de los 4 hijos solo 2 viven con ellos ya que los otros 2 están en Estados Unidos.


Actualmente, Carlota se dedica a sembrar maíz  y  frijoles, lo ha hecho desde que era niña  ya que fue un tío quien  le enseñó este trabajo, en aquel tiempo no tenían otra forma de sobrevivir mas que la agricultura, ella se levanta desde las 5:00 am a preparar el desayuno para su familia luego  tiene que trasladarse al campo donde tiene la milpa, hace un recorrido de  1 kilómetro a pie para llegar, hora de salida no tiene pues hasta que termina de hacer lo que tiene programado en ese día regresa a su casa.


Este crédito lo necesita para sembrar dos hectáreas de maíz ya que en estos días es donde empiezan a limpiar las tierras,  además terminara de sacar la cosecha que tiene en este momento.


Ella sueña con tener una mejor casa, tener un vehículo con el cual poder trasportar a su familia, darle a sus hijos y nietos el estudio que ella no tuvo, pues hoy en día quien esté mejor preparado académicamente puede conseguir un buen trabajo, ella  está segura que el crédito es un compromiso pero también sabe que solo así puede lograr sus sueños.
texts.en:
Carlota is 54 years old, and because of poverty did not attend school. She was the oldest of her siblings and had to help her mother work because her father abandoned them when she was very little and and her family was very poor. She is married and her husband works with her farming. They have 4 children, 2 of whom live with them and the other two are in the USA. Today Carlota grows corn and beans, which she has done since she was a child when her uncle showed her how to farm. Back then they didn't have any other way to survive besides farming. Today she gets up at 5 AM to prepare her family's breakfast, then she goes to the fields by foot located 1 kilometer away. She doesn't stop working until she finishes what needs to be done - then she returns home.

This loan will be used to plant 2 hectares of corn because it is the season to prepare the fields. In addition she will finish taking out the harvest that she has at this moment. She dreams of having a better house, of having a vehicle in which she can transport her family, of giving her children and grandchildren the opportunity to go to school that she didn't have as today the person who is prepared academically can get a good job. She knows that the loan is an agreement and that only with the loan will she be able to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to plant 2 hectares of corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase food inventory for her business and school necessities for her kids.

loans.name: Mukadas

texts.ru:
Мукадас свободная молодая девушка в возрасте 19 лет. Она живет с родителями в сельском районе Дж.Руми. Она уже три месяца как работает аналитиком в микрокредитной организации. Одновременно Мукадас учится в Университете в факультете "Физики и математики". Она хороший сотрудник и прилежная студентка. 
Мукадас решила получить кредит. Она хочет купить для дома настенный кондиционер с функцией зима-лето. Кредит поможет ей улучшить бытовые условия дома. Мукадас надеется на поддержку.
texts.en:
Mukadas is 19 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents in a rural area of the J. Rumy district of Tajikistan.  For the past three months, she has been working as an analyst for a micro-credit organization.  In addition to her job, Mukadas is a university student and she takes courses in the Department of Physics and Mathematics.  She is a good worker and a diligent student.

Mukadas has decided to take a loan in order to buy a wall-mounted air-conditioning unit (with winter and summer functions) for her house.  Thanks to this loan, she'll be able to improve her home's living conditions.  She is hoping to receive some support.

loans.use: to buy a wall-mounted air-conditioning unit to be used in winter and summer.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en: Cristina is 33 years old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.  Cristina has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years, and also earns an income from pre-paid mobile load. Cristina aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Lilian Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lilian de 56 años de edad, por sus escasos recursos económicos no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja en la agricultura, tiene cuatro hijos de los cuales todos están casados y solo vive con tres nietos y son los únicos que dependen de ella.
	


Actualmente, Lilian se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura, lo ha hecho desde que era niña y lo aprendió con su pareja, aparte de la agricultura tiene crianza de gallinas lo cual le genera ingresos adicionales, ella se levanta  muy temprano para ir  a trabajar y regresa a casa hasta las 3:00 pm.



Ella necesita mucho este crédito para comprar ganado de repasto.


Sus sueños son tener una mejor vivienda, ayudar a sus nietos y darles el mejor ejemplo para que ellos puedan ser personas de bien.
texts.en:
Lilian, age 56, did not have the opportunity to go to school due to scarce financial resources.  She is in a relationship, and her life partner works in agriculture.  She has four children, and all of them are married.  She only lives with three grandchildren.  They are the only ones who are dependent upon her.

Lilian currently works in agriculture.  She has done this ever since she was a girl.  She learned with her life partner.  Besides agriculture, she raises chickens, which generates additional income.  She gets up very early in order to go to work, and she returns home at 3:00 p.m.

She really needs this loan to buy cows for the pasture.

Her dreams are to have a better house, to help her grandchildren, and to give the best example so that they are able to be good people.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Merelyn Teresa

texts.es: Merelyn tiene 21 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de un año.  Ella es una mujer emprendedora quien se dedica a la venta de productos de tienda como: cereales, golosinas, pan dulce, bebidas gaseosas, aceite, sal, etc. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de la pared frontal de su vivienda para lo cual necesita comprar ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro, etc. Espera poder contar con este crédito y así dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible ya que desea dar a sus pertenencias y familia mayor seguridad.
texts.en: Merelyn is 21 years old. She lives in her own home with her life's companion and her one year old daughter. She is an enterprising woman who works selling store products such as cereal, snacks, sweet bread, soda, oil, salt, etc. This is how she earns a living and supports her home. Wanting to improve her living conditions, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in building the front wall of her house. To do that she needs to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, etc. She hopes to have this loan so she can start construction as soon as possible, because she wants to give her belongings and family more security.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, etc. to build the front wall of her house.

loans.name: Karla Margarita
